concept.title: QuickStar icons code
concept.shortdesc: The following code illustrates the example shown.

section.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!DOCTYPE concept PUBLIC "-//OASIS//DTD DITA Concept//EN" "concept.dtd"> <concept id="keysImages" xml:lang="en-us"> <title>Quickstar Default Icons</title> <conbody> <image href="QuickStar_icons/forward.jpg" id="forward"/> <image href="QuickStar_icons/hold.jpg" id="hold"/> <image href="QuickStar_icons/mute.jpg" id="mute"/> <image href="QuickStar_icons/speakerphone.jpg" id="speakerphone"/> <image href="QuickStar_icons/talk.jpg" id="talk"/> <image href="QuickStar_icons/transfer.jpg" id="transfer"/> </conbody> </concept>
